Articles.Content:
I just put a space station in orbit of Eeloo, and then went back to the space center. By the time I entered the tracking station, the station had vanished. I checked the log file, and it says the station (called Alzir) collided through terrain. The station was in a 6.4 km orbit, and the highest point on Eeloo is supposed to be about 4 km. What's going on here? I'm going to try reloading from my backup drive, and putting the station in a much higher orbit. Maybe 100km.

I have the most recent version of KSP, and my only mod is the most recent (as far as I know) version of Mechjeb. If I uninstall Mechjeb, this station and everything else I have will disappear.

Here is what I think is the relevant section of the log file. Starting from when I went to the space center.

Does it happen all the time when you reload that save or did it happen only once? And if only once, are you sure about being on perfectly circular orbit?
